item.description:
Open Meditation Evenings

Do you already meditate? Then please join our open meditation evenings, which include both practice and discussion. Enjoy a peaceful atmosphere where your mind can come to rest and your spirit be refreshed. Bring your insights and questions for the period of discussion following meditation. Open the heart and reach the depths of your inner stillness and contentment.

* Meets the first Wednesday and third Thursday of each month, 7 p.m.-8 p.m., except in July and August, when it will meet once, on Wednesday, July 8 and Thursday, August 6.






































Advaita Meditation Center
28 Worcester Lane
Waltham, MA 02451
781-647-0020 or www.advaitameditation.org
item.name: Open meditation evening
